jasima.core.expExecution

类 ExperimentExecutor

  • java.lang.Object
    • jasima.core.expExecution.ExperimentExecutor
  • 直接已知子类:
    ForkJoinPoolExecutor, ThreadPoolExecutor

    public abstract class ExperimentExecutor
extends java.lang.Object
    Base class for classes executing experiments. This class implements the Abstract Factory pattern, therefore ExperimentExecutor.getExecutor() has to be called to create executor instances. This call is delegated to a non-abstract implementation of ExperimentExecutor. Which ExperimentExecutor to use is determined by a system property " jasima.core.expExecution.ExperimentExecutor". As a default, a ThreadPoolExecutor is used (with a maximum number of threads equal to the number of available processors).
    版本:
    "$Id$"
    作者:
    Torsten Hildebrandt
    另请参阅:
    ThreadPoolExecutor, ForkJoinPoolExecutor

    • 方法详细资料

      • getExecutor

        public static ExperimentExecutor getExecutor()

      • runExperiment

        public abstract ExperimentFuture runExperiment(Experiment e,
                                               Experiment parent)
        Runs an experiment usually in an asynchronous ways. Therefore an ExperimentFuture is returned to access results once they become available.
        参数:
        e - The experiment to execute.
        parent - The parent experiment of "e". This might be null.
        返回:
        An ExperimentFuture to access experiment results.

      • shutdownNow

        public abstract void shutdownNow()
        Shuts down this ExperimentExecutor.

      • runAllExperiments

        public java.util.Collection<ExperimentFuture> runAllExperiments(java.util.Collection<? extends Experiment> es,
                                                                Experiment parent)
        Execute many experiments at once. The implementation here simply calls runExperiment(Experiment,Experiment) for all experiments in es.
        参数:
        es - A list of Experiments to run.
        parent - The parent experiment of "es". This might be null.
        返回:
        A Collection of ExperimentFutures, one for each submitted experiment.

      • clearInst

        public static void clearInst()
        Clears the singleton ExperimentExecutor instance. Use this method only for testing purposes!
